name: Growing Flowers
description: This art is inspired by the work of Zach Lieberman. I first draw the flower itself, then figured out how to make it constantly grow. I added a loop so the flowers appear infinitely, grow in their size with a randomized color.

name: Growing Flowers 2
description: This is a modified version of the Growing Flowers. I played around with different shapes through changing the number of petals, and added a rotation too.

name: Growing Flowers 3
description: Here I changed the opacity and size of the flower with a black backgound.

name: Growing Flowers 4
description: By modifying the shape of the petals, a whole new look has been given to the artwork.

name: Noise
description: This artwork is also similar to Zach Lieberman's piece. I added to the perlin noise a time variable to make it move.

name: Noise 2
description: By playing around with the values in the perlin noise, a different structure was born. I also added a randomized color to each line, changed the direction of the movement and added a blue background.

name: White Lines
description: Inspired by the artwork of Zach Lieberman. In a black background, the white lines appear and grow until acertain length, forming a picture like a meteorological map of the surface wind.

name: Birthday Party
description: Playing around more with the previous artwork, changing the thickness, the color and the length of the lines, a new look was born with festive vibes..

name: Paint dots on the wall
description: This work is also inspired by Zach Lieberaman. An interactive element was added, so the final picture can be created manually.

name: Flitters
description: This artwork also needs an interactive input. By clicking, colorful flitters will appear mooving to different directions, gradually disappearing.

name: Shooting Stars
description: By clicking, stars will be shooted toward different directions in different sizes.
